item.title: Talking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @svenimen_s Melissa T
item.description:
@svenimen_s wrote:

not smart to start whit p16 but ok here’s code :

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1200) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("bloody wolf")){ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bloody Wolf is online"; } else{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "Bloody wolf is offline "; } } }

But does it got any - or _ ? like Bloody_worlf Or Bloody-wolf[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 02:47:32 AM[/size][hr]Btw here :

Open up ure npchandler.java

And Search for moo

U will see : npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
At the last } add that code i gave u

^

item.title: Talking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

[ i ] makes things italicized. You should have used the [ code ] tag (no spaces).

-Alexia

Read full topic

item.title: Talking NPC's
item.dc:creator: @Hell_Hound_0516 Hell Hound 0516
item.description:
@Hell_Hound_0516 wrote:

I am useing project 16 V6 and im having trouble getting NPC’s to say Bloody Wolf is Online/Offline

After searching for moo in my NPCHandler i added

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1200) {
if (misc.random2(25) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“Bloody Wolf”)){
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Bloody Wolf is ONLINE”;
}
else{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Bloody Wolf is OFFINE”;
}
}
}

But it always says im offline, then when i change OFFLINE to ONLINE it always says in online… Please post the correct code so that i can add it to my server, I appriciate the effort!

Thanks!!! ;D

Read full topic
